arts.ttl: Luis Enrique Offers Cryptic Take on Facing Barcelona or Liverpool Next in Champions League
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain secured their place in the UEFA Champions League Round of 16 with a commanding 7-0 victory (10-0 on aggregate) over Stade Brestois on Wednesday at the Parc des Princes. Bradley Barcola got things started with a goal in the 20th minute, putting PSG up 4-0 on aggregate. arts.ttl: Barcelona, Liverpool Warned by Brest Boss as PSG Have ‘Great Chance’ to Advance
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain secured their spot in the UEFA Champions League Round of 16 after a dominant 7-0 win (10-0 on aggregate) over Stade Brestois on Wednesday night at the Parc des Princes. arts.ttl: Paris Saint-Germain sweep past Brest as Juventus crash out of Champions League
arts.sum: Juventus were beaten by PSV Eindhoven to complete a miserable week for Italian teams in the competition

arts.ttl: All Possible UEFA Champions League Round of 16 Games
arts.sum: Every possible Champions League tie for the round of 16 ahead of the draw on Feb. 21.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | PSG 7-0 Brest [agg. 10-0]: Hosts cruise into Champions League last 16
arts.sum: There was little doubt about Brest’s unlikely European adventure coming to an end at the Parc des Princes, against an opponent they’d already faced (and lost to) twice this month…

arts.ttl: PSG winger Barcola has raised his game since Kvaratskhelia's arrival
arts.sum: Since Kvaratskhelia joined from Napoli in mid-January, the 22-year-old Barcola has now scored three times in four Champions League games having failed to score at all in the competition before then. He might have done even more damage but was taken off with the score 3-0 and the match already safe on a night where PSG became the first team to have seven different scorers in a Champions League game.

arts.ttl: Fabrizio Romano Gives Major Update on Tottenham, PSG’s £60M-Rated Target Amid Controversy
arts.sum: Last summer, Paris Saint-Germain showed interest in Atalanta forward Ademola Lookman, but a deal never materialized. However, a recent report suggests the Ligue 1 club is still interested in signing the Nigerian standout. arts.ttl: West Ham Benefits From PSG Covering Substantial Wages of €20M-Rated Loanee
arts.sum: Carlos Soler is making the most of his minutes at West Ham United. However, his time with the Hammers may come to an end after just one season. Soler recognized he needed a fresh start this summer to secure regular playing time. arts.ttl: How Aston Villa Coaching Staff Is Reacting to Marco Asensio After PSG Exit
arts.sum: Marco Asensio will attempt to get his career back on track after falling out of favor with Luis Enrique at Paris Saint-Germain. As a result, it led to his winter transfer window move to Aston Villa.
